Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, east of the Ashton River.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the Ashton River flowing north as you walk along the road. The Ashton Waterfall is visible up ahead to the south, along with the Ashton Falls Resort. The Resort is a very exclusive club for only the upper crust of society.
